summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of the alley in block 45, Capitol Hill Addition, Division No. 6, from East Roy Street to East Aloha Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 96899 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
